Exebenus at the Oman Petroleum & Energy Show, 21-23 March 2021

Exebenus joins Ops Excellence at the OPES, March 21-23 2022 in Muscat Oman.

You can find us on stand 2001, 2002, 2101, 2102, 2201 & 2202.

Olav Revheim, Exebenus CEO/CTO, presents “Drilling optimization by real-time machine learning – showcasing successful field cases” in the Digital transformation theater, Monday March 21 at 12:30 pm in the Digital oil & Gas zone. Join us there!
